channel.title: For Moderators
channel.description:
I dont care if you delete this.
You mod tick me off! You abuse your power and curse at people just trying to get a little help! And this goes for everyone here who calls people idiots and curses at people. So, all you bullys here, read the Guidelines and stop being a bunch of bastards. If you want to help a new member.... help, dont fight. If you delete or lock this then your just a stupid coward who only cares about themself!
So just be quiet and leave people alone. If you have nothing nice to say, dont say it at all.

item.title: For Moderators
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

This really must have come from deep down…

You have no proof, and probably are just doing this because you think a mod did something unfair to you. I HOPE this gets deleted.

benny679:

So just be quiet and leave people alone. If you have nothing nice to say, dont say it at all.

Search Dictionary.com for the word Hypocrite.

Read full topic
